item.title: D-Day Dice Pocket
item.description: D-Day Dice Pocket is one of the games I backed on Kickstarter. The Kickstarter campaign was actually for D-Day Dice: 2nd Edition and D-Day Dice Pocket came in the package on higher pledge levels. I’m yet to try the main D-Day Dice game, but judging from the experience while playing its smaller brother, it might actually be quite fun. D-Day Dice Pocket actually contains two games in one small package - D-Day Dice Battle!
